author: potuz
content: <@425274498732916736> can you point me to where the benches for BLS MSM benchmarks were carried? I'm interested in comparisons of these curves vos secp256k1 for example. Perhaps <@427491045308235776> knows?

author: chfast
content: I believe my data was from my internal tooling in evmone (and we use BLST). I don't think there are universal benchmarks for these, but now it may be easier to add these to EEST.

author: chfast
content: Well, actually the basic cases are already in EEST: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/blob/main/tests/benchmark/test_worst_compute.py#L1614-L1656

author: potuz
content: I trust better your data, or even any data from people I can contact directly to see how they were performed. Can you point me to yours? do you have for both BLST and secp? what I was asked is to see that indeed BLS is actually much slower than secp
